(Exact Name of Registrant as Specified in Charter) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Delaware &nbsp; 001-38449 &nbsp; 35-2617337 (State or other jurisdiction of incorporation) &nbsp; (Commission File Number) &nbsp; (IRS Employer Identification No.) 1320 Ridder Park Drive, San Jose, California &nbsp; 95131 (Address of principal executive offices) &nbsp; (Zip Code) (408) 433-8000 (Registrant&#146;s telephone number, including area code) &nbsp; &nbsp; Check the appropriate box below if the Form 8-K filing is intended to simultaneously satisfy the filing obligation of the registrant under any of the following provisions: &nbsp; &#9744; Written communications pursuant to Rule 425 under the Securities Act (17 CFR 230.425) &nbsp; &#9744; Soliciting material pursuant to Rule 14a-12 under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14a-12) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 14d-2(b) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.14d-2(b)) &nbsp; &#9744; Pre-commencement communications pursuant to Rule 13e-4(c) under the Exchange Act (17 CFR 240.13e-4(c)) Indicate by check mark whether the registrant is an emerging growth company as defined in Rule 405 of the Securities Act of 1933 (&#167;&nbsp;230.405 of this chapter) or Rule 12b-2 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (&#167;&nbsp;240.12b-2 of this chapter). Emerging growth company&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&nbsp;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&nbsp;&nbsp;&#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&nbsp;8.01 Other Events. On October&nbsp;12, 2018, Broadcom Inc. (&#147;Broadcom&#148;) and CA, Inc. (&#147;CA&#148;) obtained clearance under the antitrust laws of the European Union with respect to Broadcom&#146;s pending acquisition of CA, which was the last regulatory approval required to consummate the acquisition. Clearance of the transaction under the antitrust laws of Japan was obtained on October&nbsp;2, 2018. Broadcom expects the acquisition of CA to be completed on November&nbsp;5, 2018, the first day of its 2019 fiscal year. Cautionary Note Regarding Forward-Looking Statements This Form 8-K contains forward-looking statements (including within the meaning of Section&nbsp;21E of the United States Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, and Section&nbsp;27A of the United States Securities Act of 1933, as amended) concerning Broadcom and CA. These statements include, but are not limited to, statements regarding the expected completion and timing of the proposed transaction. These forward-looking statements are based on current expectations and beliefs of the management of Broadcom and CA (as the case may be), as well as assumptions made by, and information currently available to, such management, current market trends and market conditions and involve risks and uncertainties, many of which are outside of each company&#146;s and their management&#146;s control, and which may cause actual results to differ materially from those contained in forward-looking statements. Accordingly, you should not place undue reliance on such statements. Those risks, uncertainties and assumptions include: the risk that the proposed transaction may not be completed in a timely manner or at all, which may adversely affect Broadcom&#146;s and CA&#146;s business and the price of the common stock of Broadcom and CA; the failure to satisfy any of the remaining conditions to the consummation of the proposed transaction; and other risks described in CA&#146;s filings and Broadcom&#146;s and its predecessors&#146; filings with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission, such as Quarterly Reports on Form&nbsp;10-Q&nbsp;and Annual Reports on Form&nbsp;10-K. Forward-looking statements speak only as of the date of this communication. Neither Broadcom nor CA undertake any intent or obligation to publicly update or revise any of the forward-looking statements made in this Form 8-K, whether as a result of new information, future events or otherwise, except as required by law.
